title: Very Last Day

tokens.lyric: Everybody's going to pray on the very last day,

lines.raw: [Am]Everybody's going to pray on the very last day,

tokens.lyric: When they hear that bell ring the world away.

lines.raw: [Em]When they hear that bell ring the world away.

tokens.lyric: Everybody's going to pray

lines.raw: [Am]Everybody's going to pray

tokens.lyric: To the heavens on the Judgment Day.

lines.raw: [G]To the heavens on the Judgment Day.

tokens.lyric: Well, you can sing about the great King David,

lines.raw: [Am]Well, you can sing about the great King David,

tokens.lyric: And you can preach about the wisdom of Saul;

lines.raw: [G]And you can preach about the wisdom of Saul;

tokens.lyric: Well, you can speak out about the prophet Elijah

lines.raw: [C]Well, you can speak out about the prophet Elijah

tokens.lyric: When the trumpet sounds the call.

lines.raw: [E7]When the trumpet sounds the call.

tokens.lyric: All equal and the same,

lines.raw: [Am]All equal and the same,

tokens.lyric: When the Lord, He calls your name.

lines.raw: [G]When the Lord, He calls your name.

tokens.lyric: Get ready, brothers, for that day.

lines.raw: [F]Get ready, brothers, for that day.

tokens.lyric: Well, one day soon all men shall stand;

lines.raw: [Am]Well, one day soon all men shall stand;

tokens.lyric: His word will be heeded in all the land.

lines.raw: [G]His word will be heeded in all the land.

tokens.lyric: And men shall know and men shall see

lines.raw: [C]And men shall know and men shall see

tokens.lyric: That we all are brothers and we all are free.

lines.raw: [E7]That we all are brothers and we all are free.

tokens.lyric: Mankind was made of clay.

lines.raw: [Am]Mankind was made of clay.

tokens.lyric: Each of us in the very same way.

lines.raw: [G]Each of us in the very same way.

tokens.lyric: Get ready, brothers, for that day.

lines.raw: [F]Get ready, brothers, for that day.

tokens.lyric: Well, the law is given and the law is known.

lines.raw: [Am]Well, the law is given and the law is known.

tokens.lyric: The tale is told and the seed is sown.

lines.raw: [G]The tale is told and the seed is sown.

tokens.lyric: From dust we came and to dust we'll go;

lines.raw: [C]From dust we came and to dust we'll go;

tokens.lyric: You know the Lord, He once told us so.

lines.raw: [E7]You know the Lord, He once told us so.

tokens.lyric: Each brother take his hand;

lines.raw: [Am]Each brother take his hand;

tokens.lyric: Heed the meaning of the Lord's command.

lines.raw: [G]Heed the meaning of the Lord's command.

tokens.lyric: Get ready, brothers, for that day.

lines.raw: [F]Get ready, brothers, for that day.
